alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:22AM CST until January 26 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Angelina River Near Cushing affecting Rusk and Nacogdoches Counties. For the East Fork Angelina River...including Cushing...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork Angelina River near Cushing. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 15.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.8 feet on 12/29/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 930 AM CST.
